topic.title: Customize the Default Icons for Toolbars/Menus

section.title: Question
section.p: How can I change the default icons used for the built-in actions?

section.title: Answer
section.p: If you look inside the main JAR library \lib\oxygen.jar or \lib\author.jar, it contains an images folder that contains all the images used for buttons, menus, and toolbars.

To overwrite them with your own creations, follow these steps:
In the \lib directory create a folder called endorsed.
In the endorsed folder create another folder called images.
Add your own images in the images folder.
You can use this mechanism to overwrite any kind of resource located in the main Oxygen JAR library. The folder structure in the endorsed directory and in the main Oxygen JAR must be identical.
